sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 36 cm. What is the length of each side? (Hint: An equilateral triangle has all sides equal.)
message_2:
To find the length of each side of an equilateral triangle, we can divide the perimeter by the number of sides. An equilateral triangle has 3 equal sides.

Perimeter = 36 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of each side = Perimeter / Number of sides = 36 cm / 3 = 12 cm

Each side of the equilateral triangle is 12 cm long.
